nodes.text:
A metal rack holds laminated placards. (pause)
Each is numbered. Each is revised. (pause)
Each contradicts the next like a committee argument preserved in plastic. (pause)

Placard 1: “VERIFY TRAINING CURRENCY PRIOR TO ENABLE.” (pause)
Placard 2: “APPLY PERSONAL LOTO PRIOR TO ENTRY.” (pause)
Placard 3: “CONFIRM VENTILATION NORMAL PRIOR TO LOTO VERIFICATION.” (pause)
Placard 4: “IF VENTILATION NOT NORMAL, INITIATE PURGE USING ENABLED CONTROLS.” (pause)

A final placard sits behind the rest. Less handled. (pause)
“IF REQUIREMENTS CONFLICT, STOP AND DOCUMENT CONSTRAINTS. DO NOT RESOLVE VIA ASSUMPTION.”

It doesn’t resolve by action. (pause) It resolves by definition.

The stack doesn’t provide a pen. (pause) It assumes you brought one. (pause) Or someone else did.
